text:
@realDonaldTrump WE DONT NEED THIS BILL😡 NEVER ALLOW IT.  ITS EVIL AND A GAME. REMEMBER  WHENEVER  YOU SIGN A BILL THAT GOES FOR YOU TOO.

bill H.R. 6666, introduced by Democratic Congressman Bobby Rush and also known as the COVID-19 Testing, Reaching, And Contacting Everyone (TRACE) Act
